
# NeedForRead

Welcome to the Research Paper Recommendation Web App! This application allows users to register, subscribe to a research paper recommendation system, receive weekly suggestions via email, and connect with a community of individuals with similar research interests.

In addition to its core features, this web app is designed to provide an enriching experience for users who are passionate about research and knowledge sharing. The platform not only offers personalized research paper recommendations but also fosters a collaborative environment where users can engage with like-minded individuals, comment on similar papers they have read and have a disscussion forum for the same.




## Badges




[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Official_Selection-Artizen_Season_3-1acc6c?logo=image/svg+xml;base64,&labelColor=464646&style=for-the-badge)](https://www.artizen.fund/)
[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Incubated_by-100.builders-9146ff?logo=gamejolt&logoColor=white&labelColor=464646&style=for-the-badge)](https://app.100.builders/directory)



## Features
- User registration and authentication system.
- Subscription management for research paper recommendations.
- Weekly cron job to send personalized research paper suggestions via email.
- Integration of AI hooks for enhancing recommendation accuracy.
- Community portal for users to connect and interact.
- Frontend built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript; Backend built using Flask.
- Data storage and retrieval using SQL database.

## Technologies
- Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
- Backend: Flask (Python)
- Database: SQL
- AI: AI hooks to be added 
- SMTP: SMTPlib



## Run

```javascript
 python app.py
```
## Future Scopes
- **Collaborative Filtering:** Implement collaborative filtering techniques for more personalized recommendations.
- **Mobile App:** Develop a mobile app version of the web app for better user accessibility.

## Contributing
Contributions are welcome! If you have frontend skills (JavaScript, CSS) or API development experience, we would love your help. To contribute:
1. Fork the repository.
2. Create a new branch: `git checkout -b feature-new-feature`
3. Make your changes and commit them: `git commit -am 'Add new feature'`
4. Push to the branch: `git push origin feature-new-feature`
5. Submit a pull request explaining your changes.
